1.0.0.name: wordpress/wangguard-wysija-newsletter-connector
1.0.0.description:
Verify Wysija subscribers before adding them to your Wysija subscribers list by checking against the WangGuard service that each new subscriber is not reported as a known Splogger or unwanted user.

WangGuard plugin version 1.5.3+ and Wysija Neswletter version 2.1.9+. is needed

Why use WangGuard - Wysija Newsletter Connector?

Well, connecting WangGuard and Wysija, you will be able send activations emails and newsletter only a real people, That means it will reduce greatly the risk of being flagged as spam server (Black listed).

Developers

You will find in this plugin a very easy way to connect your plugin with WangGuard plugin. If your plugin has a form, maybe you can be interested in use WangGuard. Please, never use WangGuard for check Trackbacks or Pingbacks.
